entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:48 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
